attributes.caption: Barbara drinks the blood of the young so that she can sing Forever Young better.

attributes.title: A HORDE OF ORGASMS - #99
attributes.caption: Joel leaves everyone satisfied, Cole likes to get handcuffed, Jeremy is a snuggler & Barbara gets the weiner.
attributes.description: Joel leaves everyone satisfied, Cole likes to get handcuffed, Jeremy is a snuggler & Barbara gets the weiner. Welcome to a new season of On The Spot. Let's just see what happens this season, shall we?

attributes.title: EPISODE 100 - #100
attributes.caption: We made it to one hundred episodes. Does this mean we can get syndicated, sell the show to TBS and just wait for the royalty checks to come in from now on? I'm getting that Seinfeld money!!
attributes.description: We made it to one hundred episodes. Does this mean we can get syndicated, sell the show to TBS and just wait for the royalty checks to come in from now on? I'm getting that Seinfeld money!!Thanks to Dollar Shave Club for sponsoring this episode.

attributes.title: WHAT IS A HIPPO CAMPUS? - #101
attributes.caption: Here's a fun game to play. Count the veins on Blaine's neck during Ass Swipe.
attributes.description: Here's a fun game to play. Count the veins on Blaine's neck during Ass Swipe.

attributes.title: THAT ONE WHERE SOMEONE ALMOST DIED ON IT - #102
attributes.caption: We finally have a fun redemption challenge that isn't gross or painful and Andy still finds a way to screw it up royally.
attributes.description: We finally have a fun redemption challenge that isn't gross or painful and Andy still finds a way to screw it up royally. Check out the Wag Walking app
attributes.display_title: THAT ONE WHERE SOMEONE ALMOST DIED ON IT - #102

attributes.title: SOFTCORE IMPROV COMEDY - #103
attributes.caption: Improvisational theatre, often called improv or impro, is the form of theatre, often comedy, in which most or all of what is performed is unplanned or unscripted. Also lots of male nudity for some reason.
attributes.description: Improvisational theatre, often called improv or impro, is the form of theatre, often comedy, in which most or all of what is performed is unplanned or unscripted. Also lots of male nudity for some reason.

attributes.title: JON DOESN'T HOST ANYMORE -  #104
attributes.caption: We were told the cast and crew of Arrested Development were coming to do On The Spot and instead some child wearing a pink dad hat, an illegal alien from Canada and a failed white rapper showed up, drank all of our booze, threw baby food everywhere and ge
attributes.description: We were told the cast and crew of Arrested Development were coming to do On The Spot and instead some child wearing a pink dad hat, an illegal alien from Canada and a failed white rapper showed up, drank all of our booze, threw baby food everywhere and generally made everyone uncomfortable.

attributes.title: DRAG IS FAB - #105
attributes.caption: Welcome to On The Spot: Drag Edition, brought to you by shade and sass.
attributes.description: Welcome to On The Spot: Drag Edition, brought to you by shade and sass. No heels, no contouring, no service. There are straws for your drinks, all of the walls are mirrors for obvious reasons and every 10 minutes is a lip sync battle. Please enjoy yourself and remember, you own everything!

attributes.title: DAY 5 CANCELLED - #106
attributes.caption: ​I invited the creator, writers and directors of Day 5 to come on my show.
attributes.description: I invited the creator, writers and directors of Day 5 to come on my show. Funny thing is the only person who promoted their stupid show is the sex addict wearing a bath robe that had nothing to do with the production of Day 5. Oh well. At least I got to see some "D".

attributes.title: SHE LICKS EVERYTHING - #107
attributes.caption: Barbara has cooties, Max is trying to start a fight, Ellie is England's Mickey Mouse and Jeremy's head breaks in the end.
attributes.description: Barbara has cooties, Max is trying to start a fight, Ellie is England's Mickey Mouse and Jeremy's head breaks in the end. This episode originally aired August 16, 2017 and is sponsored by Beachbody on Demand and Felix Gray

attributes.title: GAMESHOW OF THRONES - #108
attributes.caption: Dragons are animals. Animals eat stuff. Therefore dragons eat stuff. Therefore dragons have to poo.
attributes.description: Dragons are animals. Animals eat stuff. Therefore dragons eat stuff. Therefore dragons have to poo. Which then not only brings up the question of how big these poos are or what consistency they are but also where do they put the poo AND what are the magical and/or medicinal properties of said poo? This episode originally aired August 23, 2017 and is sponsored by Beachbody on Demand and Dollar Shave Club

attributes.title: MAGICIANS CURSED HER! - #109
attributes.caption: ​Barbara thought it was just another normal episode of On The Spot. Little did she know Max & Patrick came prepared with a plethora of hexes up their sleeves.
attributes.description: Barbara thought it was just another normal episode of On The Spot. Little did she know Max & Patrick came prepared with a plethora of hexes up their sleeves. This episode originally aired August 30, 2017 and is sponsored by Blue Apron and MVMT

attributes.title: Michael and Lindsay Do Goo - #115
attributes.caption: How fast can you change a really dirty diaper?
attributes.description: How fast can you change a really dirty diaper?  And, Michael is caught by Jar Jar (Lindsay) shaking his money-maker. Sponsored by Casper (http://bit.ly/2dQg1oc) and Lazer Team 2 (http://bit.ly/2iWqPsg).  Hosted by Jon Risinger.  Featuring Michael and Lindsay Jones, Chris Demarais and Patrick Matthews.
